00020 ModelParameter::ModelParameter(QDomNode &modelParameterNode): 
00021 nameGroup_(modelParameterNode),
00022 value_(QString()), 
00023 attributes_(),
00024 valueAttributes_() {
00025 
00026         // get the modelParameter attributes
00027         General::parseAttributes(modelParameterNode, attributes_);
00028 
00029         for (int i = 0; i < modelParameterNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00030                 QDomNode tempNode = modelParameterNode.childNodes().at(i);
00031 
00032                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:value")) {
00033                         value_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00034 
00035                         // get the value attributes that define the value
00036                         General::parseAttributes(tempNode, valueAttributes_);
00037                 }
00038         }
00039 
00040         // if mandatory elements are missing
00041         if (nameGroup_.name_.isNull()) {
00042                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element name missing in "
00043                                 "spirit:modelParameter"));
00044         }
00045         return;
00046 }

00052 valueAttributes_() {
00053 }

00063 ModelParameter & ModelParameter::operator=( const ModelParameter &other ) {
00064         if (this != &other) {
00065                 nameGroup_ = other.nameGroup_;
00066                 value_ = other.value_;
00067                 attributes_ = other.attributes_;
00068                 valueAttributes_ = other.valueAttributes_;
00069         }
00070         return *this;

00073 ModelParameter::~ModelParameter() {
00074         attributes_.clear();

00076         return;

00079 void ModelParameter::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00080         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:modelParameter");
00081         General::writeAttributes(writer, attributes_);
00082 
00083         // if name is not defined
00084         if (nameGroup_.name_.isEmpty()) {
00085                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory name missing in "
00086                                 "spirit:modelParameter"));
00087         }
00088         else {
00089                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:name", nameGroup_.name_);
00090         }
00091 
00092         if (!nameGroup_.displayName_.isEmpty()) {
00093                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:displayName", nameGroup_.displayName_);
00094         }
00095 
00096         if (!nameGroup_.description_.isEmpty()) {
00097                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:description", nameGroup_.description_);
00098         }
00099 
00100         if (value_.isEmpty()) {
00101                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory value missing is spirit:"
00102                                 "modelParameter"));
00103         }
00104         else {
00105                 // start the spirit:value tag
00106                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:value");
00107 
00108                 // write the attributes for the element
00109                 General::writeAttributes(writer, valueAttributes_);
00110 
00111                 // write the value of the element and close the tag
00112                 writer.writeCharacters(value_);
00113                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:value
00114         }
00115 
00116         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:modelParameter
00117 }

00192 bool ModelParameter::isValid() const {
00193 
00194         // if usage type is specified
00195         if (attributes_.contains(QString("spirit:usageType"))) {
00196                 
00197                 // if usage is not valid type
00198                 QString usage = attributes_.value(QString("spirit:usageType"));
00199                 if (usage != QString("nontyped") && usage != QString("typed"))
00200                         return false;
00201         }
00202 
00203         // name and value must be defined
00204         if (nameGroup_.name_.isEmpty() || value_.isEmpty())
00205                 return false;
00206 
00207         return true;
00208 }
